sub_title: Graduate of Global Trade & Business Management from HAS University of Applied Sciences
summary:
Hello, I'm Fatima Ezzahrae Najib, a 23-year-old Moroccan international Horticulture and Business Management graduate from HAS University of Applied Sciences in den Bosch, the Netherlands, with a major in Global trade and business management.

In a nutshell, I would describe myself as an enthusiastic, detail-oriented, and open-minded individual. I take pride in my ability to easily connect with others and my strong work ethic. Thriving in international work environments, I find joy in collaborating with motivated individuals from all corners of the world.

My passion lies in marketing, communication, and business management. As I embark on my career journey, I am driven to explore opportunities in related fields, aiming to elevate my professional path to new heights.

profile_positions.description:
For nearly 2 years, I've thrived as a freelance social media content creator, specialising in the dynamic world of fashion and beauty. With a dedicated following of approximately 17K across my active platforms, I've been passionately creating engaging content for my personal brand. Along this journey, I've had the privilege of collaborating with a diverse range of brands, numbering in the hundreds. My mission has always been to help these brands resonate with their target audiences by creating captivating content that introduces their products and services to new audiences and horizons.

- Specialised in social media content creation.
- Expertise in the fashion and beauty niche.
- Proficient in creating engaging content.
- Maintaining a dedicated following of approximately 17K across various platforms.
- Collaborated with a diverse range of brands.
- Created captivating content to resonate with various target audiences.
- Introduced products and services to new audiences.
- Committed to creating content passionately.
- Driven by the mission to help brands connect with audiences.
profile_positions.title: Content Creator

profile_positions.description:
During my internship at Q-Point B.V., I actively contributed to a Regenerative Agriculture & Circular Economy project in Kenya. Collaborating with a team of consultants, we focused on crafting an in-depth curriculum that included theoretical and practical elements of sustainable practices. My primary responsibilities centered on managing the Marketing and Financial aspects of the project. Subsequently, we presented the developed curriculum to the international organization Hand in Hand East Africa, enabling them to educate 1600 small-scale Kenyan farmers in their local language.

- Experience in Curriculum Development where I successfully oversaw marketing and financial aspects of the project assigned to me.
- Delivered engaging teaching and presentations as part of the curriculum development.
- Demonstrated skills in marketing related to curriculum development.
- Handled financial aspects related to curriculum development and project.
profile_positions.title: Junior Consultant

profile_positions.description:
During my internship at Jan Oskam, I collaborated with the team on a mutually agreed-upon professional task that aligned with both my personal and the company's objectives. The project aimed to promote and advertise Dutch apples and pears in Moroccan supermarkets. It involved extensive negotiation, communication, presentations, and showcasing of the products to diverse customers. The ultimate deliverable was a comprehensive Marketing-Export Plan.

- Demonstrated a skillset in negotiation and sales.
- Demonstrated my ability to research and analyse markets.
- Developed export plans and indicated proficiency in strategic planning.
profile_positions.title: Junior export manager
